p.b: Build a spreadsheet that multiplies 4 by 4 matrices.

body.p: You can build a spreadsheet that will multiply two matrices of a given size (or smaller) by entering one instruction and copying it appropriately.
This takes the drudgery, such as it is, out of multiplying matrices, and allows you to find higher powers of matrices as well.

is in locations A1 to A4, B1 to B4, C1 to C4 and D1 to D4 and your matrix
